title: The new British High Commissioner in Colombo presents his letter of credence to Sri Lankan President
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma The newly appointed British High Commissioner (HC) to Sri Lanka, Mr. John James Rankin, presented his letter of credence from Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II to Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa on Monday, 14 February 2011 at the formal ceremony organized by the Ministry of External Affairs at the…
